snippet: Somali pirates have freed seven Indian sailors detained for four years in exchange for an undisclosed ransom, Somali officials and a maritime monitoring group said.
abstract: Somali officials report that pirates have freed seven Indian sailors detained for four years, in exchange for an undisclosed ransom.
lead_paragraph: Somali pirates have freed seven Indian sailors detained for four years in exchange for an undisclosed ransom, Somali officials and a maritime monitoring group said.

headline.main: Somalia: Pirates Free Indian Sailors Held for 4 Years
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Pirates Free Indian Sailors Held for 4 Years
